summary: A prequel to the critically-acclaimed series featuring Jerri Blank, a 46-year-old ex-junkie ex-con who returns to high school in a bid to restart her life.
cast: Amy Sedaris|Paul Sedaris|Chandra Wilson|Kristy Thomas|Dee Finley|Deborah Rush|Ian Holm|Dan Hedaya|Joseph Cross|Elisabeth Harnois|Alexis Dziena|Ivette Dumeng|Carlo Alban|Greg Hollimon|Hechter Ubarry|Allison Janney|Philip Seymour Hoffman|Stephen Colbert|Paul Dinello|Dolores Duffy|Maria Thayer|Timothy Hsu|Tom Guiry|Wallace Little|David Pasquesi|Sarah Jessica Parker|Matthew Broderick|David Rakoff|Cal Robertson|Billy Erb|Callie Thorne|Chris Pratt|Sarah Thyre|Kristen Johnston|Justin Theroux|Lian Moy|Olivia Oguma|Jeremy Chu|Evelyn McGee|Alicia Ashley|Randy Blair|Jonah Bobo|Leanne Cabrera|Lionel Anthony Cook|Angelina Cruz|Thomas Daniel|Lorena David|Ryan Donowho|Logann Grayce|Rob Hinderliter|Tony Lagarto|Christopher Larkin|Tony Longoria|Meghan Maro|Todd Oldham|Sarah Peters|Michael Rivera|Timothy Roscoe|Jessica Rothert|Gina Vetro|Mike Yedwab
title: De vuelta al 'insti'
